TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PipeSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示管道的访问控制和审核安全。

span.span: Represents the access control and audit security for a pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定管道的访问权限以及访问尝试的审核方式。The class specifies the access rights for a pipe and how access attempts are audited. 此类将访问权限和审核权限表示为一组规则。This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules. 每个访问规则由一个 对象表示，而每个审核规则由一个 对象表示。Each access rule is represented by a object, while each audit rule is represented by a object. 类是基础 Microsoft Windows 文件安全系统的抽象。The class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system. 在此系统中，每个管道都具有自定义访问控制列表（DACL），该列表控制对管道的访问，而系统访问控制列表（SACL）用于指定审核的访问控制尝试。In this system, each pipe has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the pipe, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited. 和 类是包含 Dacl 和 Sacl 的访问控制项（Ace）的抽象。The and classes are abstractions of the access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs. 类隐藏了 Dacl 和 Sacl 的许多详细信息;不必担心 ACE 顺序或 null DACL。The class hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS. 使用 类可检索、添加或更改表示管道的 DACL 和 SACL 的访问规则。Use the class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe. 若要将新的或更改的访问或审核规则保存到管道，请使用 方法。To persist new or changed access or audit rules to a pipe, use the method. 若要从现有文件检索访问或审核规则，请使用 方法。To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个不基于现有管道的空 对象。This constructor creates an empty object that is not based on an existing pipe. 然后，你可以使用访问控制信息填充对象并将其应用于管道。You can then populate the object with access control information and apply it to a pipe. 您可以使用 方法向 对象添加访问规则或审核规则。You can add access or audit rules to the object using the method. 您可以使用 方法删除访问或审核规则。You can remove access or audit rules using the method. 若要将新的或更改的访问或审核规则保存到管道，请使用 方法。To persist new or changed access or audit rules to a pipe, use the method. 若要从现有文件检索访问或审核规则，请使用 方法。To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前 对象关联的可保护对象的 。

span.span: Gets the of the securable object that is associated with the current object.

value.span: 与当前 对象关联的可保护对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the securable object that is associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的类将重写 属性并返回用于表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时，请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前 对象中移除所有匹配的 访问规则或所有匹配 访问规则。The method removes either all matching access rules or all matching access rules from the current object. 例如，你可以使用此方法通过传递使用 值、 值和用户帐户创建的 对象来删除用户的所有 访问规则。For example, you can use this method to remove all access rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 方法将删除任何指定 值或 值的拒绝规则。The method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to add.

summary.span: 将所有访问规则从与当前 对象关联的自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除，然后添加指定的访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) that is associated with the current object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表（ACL）规则或覆盖与 `rule` 参数匹配的所有相同 ACL 规则。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果 `rule` 参数指定了一个 值，并且 方法找到指定 值的相同 ACL 规则，则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果 方法找到指定了 值的相同 ACL 规则，则也将覆盖相同的规则。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will also be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表（ACL）规则，或覆盖与 `rule` 参数的 值匹配的所有相同 ACL 规则。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果 `rule` 参数指定了一个 值，并且 方法找到指定 值的相同 ACL 规则，则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果 方法找到指定了 值的相同 ACL 规则，则不会覆盖相同的规则。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 在与当前 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中设置审核规则。

span.span: Sets an audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) that is associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的审核规则或覆盖与 `rule` 参数的 值匹配的任何相同的审核规则。The method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果 `rule` 参数指定 值，并且 方法查找指定 值的相同审核规则，则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果 方法找到指定了 值的相同审核规则，则不会覆盖相同的规则。If the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .
